title: @curie should get Nobel Prize
content: Marie Curie may have discovered radioactivity, but @curie have discovered thousands of good quality content for everyone to enjoy. She should win the Nobel Steem Prize.

title: Chuck Norris Joke #422
content: Jesus can walk on water but Chuck Norris can swim on land. And STEEM can shoot to the moon.

title: Dirty Carpet
content: Dirty Carpet? Spammy Trending? Steem-clean it with @steemcleaner. Find it at your nearest supermarket on the cleaning product aisle.

title: Steemitholic Anonymous Confession #21
content: I am Tim and I am a Steemitholic. I used to sleep normal hours, now I wake up early in the morning just to check if a whale has upvoted my post.

title: Steemitholic Anonymous Confession #34
content: I am Jamie and I am a Steemitholic. I spend so much time on steemit that I have no time for sex.

title: Steemitholic Anonymous Confession #423
content: I am Carrie and I am a Steemitholic. I have dreams about @glitterfart upvoting by posts to hundreds of dollars. When I wake up and find out it was all a dream, I cried and died a little inside.

title: He built WHAT??
content: The Egyptians might have built the pyramids, but @themarkymark @buildawhale

title: Steemit Facts #2146
content: Fact: @sweetsssj had dinner with @ned in Hong Kong at a Taiwanese Restaurant which have an instruction sheet in Japanese and French on how to eat dumplings

title: Steemit Facts #1705
content: Fact: @stellabelle once said she will pay 10,000 steem to see @fyrstikken and @berniesanders kiss and make up.

title: Steemit Fact #103
content: Fact: @ned, @dantheman and @berniesanders all enjoyed @guerrint aka Tara’s Make up video so much that she got over $30k post payout. @crytoctopus got over $900 for his comment on the post.

title: Vote @bobdos for witness
content: Vote @bobdos for witness! Vote @bobdos for witness! Vote @bobdos for witness!

title: 1000 Followers!
content: Wrote a post thanking all of you 1000 loyal followers for their support. Got 68 Upvotes.

title: Look at my upvotes!
content: Got 68 upvotes for my post. Only 15 views.

title: Traf’s performance debut
content: @traf’s first standup comedy performance received rave reviews: “This fantastic funny!” – Bot #1; “Very Amazing funny!” – Bot#2; “Thanks for you sir” – Bot#1 and Bot #2; “Nice funny” – Bot #15;   “Beautiful funny” – Bot #5

title: Steemit Fact #547
content: Fact: @acidyo has OCD.  Operation Curation Delegation that is. Helping new comers get recognised since 2017.

title: Drop bear
content: Drop bear is a Koala like animal native to Australia which prey on smaller animals and humans by dropping onto them from the treetops, knocking them out. @bearone can tell you all about it if you could make her neighbour’s dogs shut up.

title: Steemit Fact #212
content: Fact: @travelgirl was almost @hellokitty if that name hasn’t been taken by someone who only made three posts since 2016 and earned $6172 for one of her posts.

title: Steemitholic Anonymous Confession #666
content: My name is Jackie and I am a Steemitholic. I used to go to a restaurant and order food that I like. Now I only order food that looks good on my smartphone.

title: Better than Facebook?
content: Are we better than facebook yet? May be not, but we already have @surpassinggoogle

title: Steemitholic Anonymous Confession #787
content: My name is Pete and I am a Steemitholic. I used to need coffee to wake up. Now I have a dose of steemit instead.

title: Steemitholic Anonymous Confession #2343
content: My name is Ronald and I am a Steemitholic. I used to cope with just 1GB of mobile data. Now I need 10GB just so I can check my posts 300 times a day
